events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Emily for further assistance.
Hello, this is Emily from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and would like to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the prompt help. I appreciate how quickly this is being handled.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please check your account in a few days for confirmation.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your excellent support and fast response.
Closing this support case now since the refund has been received and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
